entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 9:39 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
